attributes.action: The UK government to acknowledge young people's concerns about climate change
attributes.additional_details: UK politicians need to consider seriously the actions that they must take to provide a sustainable future for young people. They must debate this in Westminster to take active steps to make legal, binding changes
attributes.background: Young people are concerned about what their future in our world will look like if we continue to contribute to climate change through our current actions. We are trying to make a sustainable future for future generations since past and current generations continue to damage our world

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about climate change, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may also wish to sign one of these petitions:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231038
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234717
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231518
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/230041
